name: Granada
overview: The Super Strategic Defense Initiative of the 1990's banned inter-continental ballistic missiles and nuclear warheads. Now the year is 2016. Weapons today are limited to super strategic mobile weapons. Enter Granada. Hypertek-Cannon Tank. (HCT). Firepower as we know it today is all but abandoned with Granada. Granada uses shield and radar to create its defense mechanism. Offensive firepower is provided by the most awesome array of weaponry ever assembled on a battlefield.These include multi-directional interceptors, long-range homing missiles, and a device designed to totally obliterate all opposing forces. You will command Granada through the peaceful streets of Tobora. Battle the giant flying battleship Astarsha, and Valsic, another HCT.
